posts.post_title: FS. More T206 SGC 40 and 30 Hof Sovereign, Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Hi, for sale are a few more T206 SGC graded cards with Sovereign and Polar Bear Backs. I would like payment made with a paypal gift sent to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. Prices include shipping. 

ALL SOLD

SGC 30 Joe Kelley(HOF) Sovereign 350 (SOLD)
SGC 40 Eddie Phelps Polar Bear(w Tobacco stains) (SOLD)
SGC 40 Harry Steinfeldt Polar Bear (SOLD)
SGC 40 Jimmy Slagle Polar Bears (SOLD)



Thanks
Joe
